articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.title: Past vs. Present — Examining Bitcoin's History of Bull Market Corrections – Featured Bitcoin News - Bitcoin.com News
articles.description: As of now, the price of bitcoin has decreased by 23.4% from its peak of $73,737, reached on March 14, 2024, about four months ago.

articles.author: Simon Hill
articles.title: 23 Best Early Amazon Prime Day Deals (2024) - WIRED
articles.description: Prime Day falls on July 16 and 17, but we’ve handpicked deals on WIRED-tested products—from tech to blenders to hair straighteners—sitting at some of their lowest prices ever.
articles.content: The biggest and best of the summer sales is Amazon's Prime Day event, which runs on July 16 and 17 this year. But you don't necessarily need to wait to bag a bargain, because Amazon always lets a few… [+12890 chars]
